description.showStepper: Option to hide or show stepper.
description.autoSlide: If set to true, slider will auto slide with default delay. Can also receive an int to set delay in seconds
description.peekSlides: Adds some padding to show a peek of next and previous slides
description.navigationHover: Only show navigation when hovering over the slider
description.ratio: The size ratio of the slider
description.repeatSlide: Will allow the slide to repeat its cycle
